titles.title: Stop Identity Fraud and Identity Theft Act of 2026
Stop Identity Fraud and Identity Theft Act of 2026
To establish a government-wide approach to stopping identity fraud and theft in the financial services industry, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
